text: This Is Us creator Dan Fogelman was getting ready — brushing his teeth while listening to the nominations on his wife's cell phone — as he prepared to head back to work on episode two of the NBC drama's sophomore season when he learned of his show's multiple mentions. The time - jumping family drama scored 11 total nominations — including best drama series, the first time a broadcast series has cracked the category since 2011. ` ` The emails are flying!''
